sentences.sContent: His first aim is to get the warring parties back to the negotiating table (= discussing something ).
sentences.sCn: 他的首要目标就是把交战各方拉回到谈判桌上。

sentences.sContent: ...they will meet in Copenhagen in December to negotiate a new international climate treaty...
...Industrial scientists tend to receive training that academics do not, such as how to build a multidisciplinary team,manage budgets and negotiate contracts...
...Children have to learn to negotiate the world on their own...

words.tran: 可通过谈判解决的；可协商的

trans.tranCn: 洽谈， 协商； 顺利通过， 成功越过； 协商， 谈判
trans.tranOther: to discuss something in order to reach an agreement, especially in business or politics
